EmailTemplate.subject: Your application to Transform UK's web development workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}, Competition for places was extremely high, and your application stood out as someone who is really passionate about the digital industry.
Please find details for the course as follows:
Location
60 Great Portland St, Fitzrovia, London, W1W 7RT Nearest tube stations are Oxford Circus, Great Portland Street, and Goodge Street
Times
10am to 6pm, with an hour for lunch (lunch is provided) Please arrive 15 minutes early to allow time to register
Contact details
Your contact from The Challenge for this event is Ian Van der Heyden, The Challenge's National Graduate Manager His phone number is 07837 417494 If you have any concerns before or during the course, please speak to Ian
If you are no longer able to attend this course then please email graduates@the-challenge.org as soon as possible. We have a long waiting list, and will offer your place to another applicant.
Congratulations once again, and enjoy the course! All the best
NCS Graduates Team
The Challenge Society
